name: part_004
file: tmp_【 ごちそうさまでした 】沙花叉クロヱ卒業ライブ【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [F9lbxgimNIE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Ano Band' (あのバンド) by Kessoku Band.
Performance of 'Bitter Choco Decoration' (ビターチョコデコレーション) by syudou.

subtitles.original: 心臓
subtitles.english: Heart

subtitles.original: ほかに何も聞きたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear anything else

subtitles.original: わたしが放つ音以外
subtitles.english: Except for the sounds I make

subtitles.original: いらない
subtitles.english: I don't need it

subtitles.original: 背中を
subtitles.english: My back

subtitles.original: 押すなよ
subtitles.english: Don't push me

subtitles.original: さあ、地獄の底まで触るな
subtitles.english: Come, don't touch me until the depths of hell

subtitles.original: 始発の
subtitles.english: The first train's

subtitles.original: ベルが鳴る
subtitles.english: The bell rings

subtitles.original: 乗客はわたし一人だけ
subtitles.english: I'm the only passenger

subtitles.original: 手を叩く
subtitles.english: Clapping hands

subtitles.original: わたしだけの音
subtitles.english: Only my sound

subtitles.original: 足鳴らす
subtitles.english: Stomping feet

subtitles.original: 即席残すまで
subtitles.english: Until leaving an improvised footprint

subtitles.original: 目を開ける
subtitles.english: Opening eyes

subtitles.original: 孤独の衝動を
subtitles.english: The impulse of loneliness

subtitles.original: 受け止める
subtitles.english: Accepting it

subtitles.original: 心の衝動を今胸の奥
subtitles.english: The impulse of the heart, now deep within my chest

subtitles.original: 確かめる心音
subtitles.english: Confirming the heartbeat

subtitles.original: ほかに何も聞きたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear anything else

subtitles.original: わたしが放つ音以外
subtitles.english: Except for the sounds I make

subtitles.original: ごちそうさまでした
subtitles.english: Thank you for the meal (Gochisousama deshita)

subtitles.original:
ビターチョコデコレーション 
 作詞・作曲：syudou
subtitles.english:
Bitter Choco Decoration 
 Lyrics/Composition: syudou

subtitles.original: 人に信じないように愛さないように期待しないように
subtitles.english: Try not to believe, not to love, not to expect from people

subtitles.original: かといって角が立たないように気取らないように目立たぬように
subtitles.english: But also try not to cause friction, not to be pretentious, not to stand out

subtitles.original: 誰一人傷つけぬように虐めぬように零さぬように
subtitles.english: Don't hurt anyone, don't bully, don't spill anything

subtitles.original: かといって善がバレぬように威張らぬように
subtitles.english: But don't let your kindness be found out, don't be arrogant

subtitles.original: 感情を殺しリップサービスも忘れぬように
subtitles.english: Kill your emotions and don't forget the lip service

subtitles.original: どんな時も笑って愛嬌振りまくように
subtitles.english: Always laugh and spread your charm

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 兎角言わずに堪能召し上がれ
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, don't say much and enjoy eating it

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 食わず嫌いはちゃんと直さなきゃ
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, you must fix your pickiness

subtitles.original: 頭空っぽその後に 残る心が本物なら
subtitles.english: If what's left after your head is empty is your real heart

subtitles.original: きっと君だって同じこと
subtitles.english: Then surely it's the same for you

subtitles.original: ところで一つ伺いますが先日どこかでやった嫌
subtitles.english: By the way, I have a question: that nasty thing you did the other day...

subtitles.original: 無駄に自我を晒さないように話さないように分からないように
subtitles.english: Try not to expose your ego needlessly, not to speak, not to be understood

subtitles.original: 黙りなさい口を閉ざさないように笑わすより笑われるように
subtitles.english: Be quiet, but don't close your mouth; be laughed at rather than making people laugh

subtitles.original: 人をちゃんと敬うように馬鹿目なように称えるように
subtitles.english: Respect people properly, act foolish, and praise them

subtitles.original: でも決して病みにならぬようにふざけぬように
subtitles.english: But never become dark, and don't fool around

subtitles.original: 集団さんからの終身刑 またへこらへこら言っちゃって
subtitles.english: Life sentence from the collective, saying "yes, yes" again

subtitles.original: 前髪上等最強じゃん とかどうでもいいのに言っちゃって
subtitles.english: Saying "Your bangs are great, you're the best" even though you don't care

subtitles.original: 毎朝毎晩限界集教的社会の集団に
subtitles.english: Every morning and every night, in a group of borderline religious society

subtitles.original: 決して発表しないように
subtitles.english: Try never to announce it

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 時に孤独な愛は君を汚す
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, sometimes lonely love stains you

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 去る鳥の跡きっとクソの跡
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, the tracks of a departing bird are surely tracks of shit

subtitles.original: 初めはあんなに凄そうな 大言壮語並べたが
subtitles.english: At first, such grand words were lined up

subtitles.original: いややいやよも好きのうち
subtitles.english: Saying no is also a sign of liking it

subtitles.original: いやはやしかし今日が初めてでこんなドアな秘めセンスあるよ
subtitles.english: Well, well, but today is the first time, and you have such a secret sense...

subtitles.original: 恋する季節にビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: In the season of love, bitter choco decoration

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちでビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: With feelings of love, bitter choco decoration

subtitles.original: F-U-C-K-Y-O-U
subtitles.english: F-U-C-K-Y-O-U

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 皆が望む理想に憧れて
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, longing for the ideal everyone wants

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 個性や情は全部焼き払い
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, burning away all individuality and emotion

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 欲やエゴは殺して土に埋め
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, kill the desires and ego and bury them in the dirt

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション 僕は大人にやっと成ったよママ
subtitles.english: Bitter choco decoration, I finally became an adult, Mama

subtitles.original: 明日のこともその先も
subtitles.english: About tomorrow and beyond

subtitles.original: 地獄は続くどこまでも
subtitles.english: Hell continues everywhere

subtitles.original: おだからこか今だけは子供のままで
subtitles.english: So for now, stay as a child
